abstract: China remains surprisingly apathetic about the warming relationship between New Delhi and Washington.
lead_paragraph: The reaction to the breadth of issues discussed during President Obama’s visit to New Delhi, and to the participants’ mutual anxiety about China, has been cool but controlled.
snippet: The reaction to the breadth of issues discussed during President Obama’s visit to New Delhi, and to the participants’ mutual anxiety about China, has been cool but controlled.

headline.main: U.S.-India Ties Deepen; China Takes It in Stride
headline.print_headline: U.S.-India Ties Deepen; China Takes It in Stride
